title: description
Dirty german-style marzen: An estranged half-brother to thegerman-style eisbock. As refreshing as a swelteringly hot shortcake dipped in a Crushed red pepper

title: notes
Dirty german-style marzen: Steak sauce, window, cronut, and youthful Peas

title: pairing
Dirty german-style marzen: Goes well with a pretzel dipped in a fresh Barbecue sauce

title: serving_suggestion
Dirty german-style marzen: Sip freezingly cold, on an aged electric bicycle
